objects.text:
• Authentic polarized lenses
• Premium acetate frame
• 100% UV protection

product_details.name: Classic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer - Timeless Style, Unmatched Elegance
product_details.description:
• Authentic Ray-Ban polarized sunglasses with iconic wayfarer design
• Premium black glossy acetate frame construction
• Dark tinted UV-protective lenses for maximum sun protection
• Signature Ray-Ban logo on temple and lens
• Comfortable lightweight design for all-day wear
• Durable hinges and frame built for long-lasting quality
• Versatile style suitable for all face shapes
• Includes original Ray-Ban case and cleaning cloth
• 100% UV protection against harmful sun rays
• Classic rectangular lens shape with modern appeal

banner_details:
This banner exhibits a sleek, modern design with a luxury aesthetic to promote premium sunglasses. The background is divided into two sections: a darker muted black (#121212) on the left and a charcoal-grey (#1E1E1E) on the right, separated by a subtle vertical golden line. The left column showcases the primary message through three bold stacked text layers (`heading`) in a golden-yellow hue, followed by a subtle descriptive phrase (`tagline`) in white. Product benefits (`description`) are listed below in bullet points. 

A promotional phrase (`subheading`) and pricing (`price`) follow, also styled with strong contrast and hierarchy. A rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) in gold with black text (`cta`) prompts users to engage. The product image (`product_image`) is featured prominently on the right, with soft gold accent circles adding visual interest to corners.

**Color Palette**:
- Jet Black: #000000
- Charcoal: #121212
- Deep Grey: #1E1E1E
- Gold Gradient: #D4AF37 → #B8860B
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of sleek Ray-Ban sunglasses, predominantly featuring a monochromatic black palette enhanced by reflective and glossy surfaces. Dominant colors include deep black (#000000) for the frame and lenses, with subtle metallic silver accents (#C0C0C0) on the hinges and logos. The branding is done in crisp white (#FFFFFF), standing out against the dark background, ensuring high visibility. The smooth blending of gloss highlights and shadows across the frame achieves an elegant contrast, projecting a premium feel. These core shades—black, silver, and white—can serve as the foundation for a minimalist yet bold advertisement banner.
